summary: This is just a small bat file i made because i am lazy and didn\'t want to go through all the hassle of gaining favor to get all the shouts.
descriptionHtml:
Any Way this bat file will give you all the shouts from the mod ThunderChild, if you have the mod installed if you don\'t already have the mod i recommend it it\'s a very nice mod and adds 29 brand new shouts with multiple effects.

ThunderChild
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41376/?

Installation:

1. Put the ThunderChild.txt in your Skyrim installation directory
2. open the file and replace the xx in the codes to your load order for Thunderchild

once in game you will then hit the ` to open up the console and type bat thunderchild. once this is done you should have all the shouts. Have Fun!

Also if anyone has troubles go ahead and pm me or post whats wrong and ill help as much as i can, i will also update this if any new shouts come out in the ThunderChild mod
author: TTGJailbreak
